remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含與組態設定的靜態方法。The class contains static methods for interfacing with configuration settings. 方法可讓開發人員來設定透過格式化的 XML 組態檔使用的遠端執行功能基礎結構。The method allows developers to configure the remoting infrastructure through the use of XML formatted configuration files. 類別也包含數個方法的用戶端的用戶端和伺服器端註冊與啟動的伺服器物件存放在伺服器上。The class also contains several methods for client-end and server-end registration of client and server activated objects that reside on the server. 類別會提供一些方法來協助您使用和發佈遠端物件。The class provides a number of methods to help in using and publishing remoted objects. 方法提供的功能來儲存啟動與通訊的執行個體中的遠端物件所需的所有相關資訊為更新版本的序列化和傳輸至遠端位置的類別。The method provides the functionality for storing all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object in an instance of the class for later serialization and transmission to a remote location. 方法會回復此程序，建立可由應用程式而不考慮任何遠端處理細分的遠端物件的 proxy。The method reverses this process, creating a proxy for a remote object that can be used by an application without regard for any remoting subdivisions. 類別保存啟動與通訊的遠端物件所需的所有相關資訊。The class holds all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object. 這個類別是傳送至遠端位置使用的通道時，會解除封送處理的物件的序列化表示法 (請參閱)，可以用來建立本機 proxy 的遠端物件。This class is a serializable representation of an object that is transmitted to a remote location using a channel, where it is unmarshaled (see ) and can be used to create a local proxy of the remoted object. > [!NOTE] > 傳址方式封送處理物件 (Mbr) 不在記憶體中不限次數。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反地，除非類型覆寫來控制其本身的存留期原則，每個 MBR 具有有限的存留期.NET Framework 遠端處理系統開始刪除和回收記憶體的程序之前。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[存留期租約](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx).
